alert.note: Alert for Caddo; Canadian; Grady (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 10 at 7:01PM CDT until April 10 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Grady County in central Oklahoma... East central Caddo County in southwestern Oklahoma... Southwestern Canadian County in central Oklahoma... * Until 745 PM CDT. * At 701 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles southwest of El Reno, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... El Reno, Union City, Minco, Cogar, and Cedar Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
